mapper.select: update INSBCarconfig set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},riskcode = #{riskcode},inskindtype = #{inskindtype},inskindcode = #{inskindcode},amount = #{amount},notdeductible = #{notdeductible},amountprice = #{amountprice},selecteditem = #{selecteditem},preriskkind = #{preriskkind},plankey = #{plankey} where id = #{id}
